Package org.wildfly.security.manager

The WildFly security manager implementation and supporting utilities.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GetAccessibleDeclaredFieldAction
    A privileged action which gets and returns a non-public field from a class.
    StackInspector
    A utility class which is useful for inspecting the call stack.
    WildFlySecurityManager
    The security manager.
    WildFlySecurityManager.Context  
    WildFlySecurityManagerPermission
    A permission specific to the WildFly security manager.
    WildFlySecurityManagerPermissionCollection Deprecated

Package org.wildfly.security.manager Description

The WildFly security manager implementation and supporting utilities. To install the security manager, see WildFlySecurityManager.install().
